alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:31PM CST until March 12 at 2:24PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 27.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Wednesday was 27.6 feet.d - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 29.1 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 26.0 27.6 Wed 7 pm CST 28.1 25.8 21.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 830 AM CST.
